mapper.select: select quota_id as str ,count(*) as value from quota where locate(#{year},year)>0 group by str

select q.quota_id,a.year,count(*) from attachment a,quota q where a.type=2 and a.name = q.name and a.year is not null and q.year is not null and locate(a.year,cast(q.year as char))>0 group by q.quota_id,a.year ;
select * from museum.museum where year is not null and locate(#{year},year)>0
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM museum.point where year=#{year} AND type>=#{typeFrom} AND type <= #{typeTo}
